data.title: tainment Center at Harrah's Cherokee, Game Center in Cherokee, NC
data.meta_description: The UltraStar Multi-tainment Center at Harrah's Cherokee in Cherokee, NC is a family-friendly entertainment venue offering a range of activities such as bowling, arcade games, and PC gaming. They also provide event booking services and a rewards program. The venue is located at 777 Casino Dr, Cherokee, NC 28719, and their contact number is (828) 497-8818. Visitors can sign up for their email newsletter to stay connected and receive notifications about deals and events. The center offers a variety of entertainment options for all ages, including bowling leagues, ESports tournaments, an arcade, private gaming stations, and on-lane dining. They also have a loyalty program with exclusive offers and rewards.
